external_references.description: Dupuy, T. and Faou, M. (2021, June). Gelsemium. Retrieved November 30, 2021.

description: [Gelsemium](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0666) can retrieve data from specific Windows directories, as well as open random files as part of [Virtualization/Sandbox Evasion](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1497).(Citation: ESET Gelsemium June 2021)
